item.title: 欧洲股市因财报频出而上扬；法国兴业银行跳涨
item.description: 在今年企业业绩最繁忙的一天，欧洲股市在乐观的盈利报告后上涨。法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）在提高投资者派息后上涨了 6.5%。【原文：European stocks gained following upbeat earnings reports on one of the busiest days of the year for corporate results. Societe Generale SA gained 6.5% after boosting investor payouts.】

item.title: 欧盟-美国贸易协议：实际达成了哪些协议，特朗普是赢家吗？
item.description: 欧盟和美国宣布达成一项政治协议，将彻底重启 1.7 万亿欧元（2 万亿美元）的跨大西洋贸易关系。【原文：The European Union and the US have announced a political agreement that will completely reset the €1.7 trillion ($2 trillion) transatlantic trade relationship.】

item.title: 中国芯片制造需求停滞，东京电子下调业绩展望
item.description: 在中国芯片制造商放缓设备备货后，东京电子有限公司将全年业绩展望下调至低于预期的水平。【原文：Tokyo Electron Ltd. slashed its full-year outlook below estimates after Chinese chipmakers slowed down efforts to stock up on equipment.】

item.title: Hammerson 启动配股，以购买 3.19 亿英镑的购物中心股权
item.description: 英国房东翰莫森公司（Hammerson Plc）计划通过配售筹集多达其现有股本 10%的资金，用于收购其尚未拥有的伯明翰两家购物中心的剩余股权。【原文：UK landlord Hammerson Plc plans to raise as much as 10% of its existing share capital through a placing to fund the buyout of the remaining stakes that it does not already own in two Birmingham shopping centers.】

item.title: 能源影响物价，法国通胀率维持在 1%以下
item.description: 法国 7 月份的通胀率保持稳定，远低于欧洲央行 2% 的目标，这支持了决策者继续为更多降息敞开大门。【原文：French inflation was stable in July at a level well below the European Central Bank’s 2% target, supporting the case for policymakers to keep the door open to more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 英国发电机组 Drax 延长回购计划，暂停投资
item.description: 英国发电商 Drax Group Plc 暂停两项重大投资后，将在三年内把股票回购计划延长 4.5 亿英镑（5.97 亿美元）。【原文：UK power generator Drax Group Plc will extend its share buyback program by £450 million ($597 million) over three years after it paused two major investments.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德同意以 24 亿英镑收购英国保险公司 Just Group
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德财富解决方案公司（Brookfield Wealth Solutions）已同意收购英国保险公司 Just Group Plc，这是该公司加强在英国养老金风险转移市场影响力的最新举措。【原文：Brookfield Wealth Solutions has agreed to buy UK insurer Just Group Plc, its latest move to boost its presence in the UK’s pension risk-transfer market.】

item.title: 特朗普谈及高关税，印度降息希望渺茫
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）出人意料地宣布征收关税，这将对印度储备银行下周的货币政策决定产生影响，即使人们还在等待贸易协议的最终结果。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s surprise tariff announcement is set to weigh on the Reserve Bank of India’s monetary policy decision next week even as a final word on the trade deal is awaited.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团因即将退出的业务利润下滑而削减股息
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）在大宗商品价格停滞不前的情况下，与竞争对手矿商一样公布利润下降，并削减了股息，因为其寻求退出的业务拖累了盈利。【原文：Anglo American Plc joined rival miners in posting lower profits amid stagnant commodity prices and slashed its dividend as the businesses its looking to exit dragged down earnings.】

item.title: Adnoc Drilling 计划在科威特和阿曼进行第二次收购：首席财务官
item.description: Adnoc Drilling Co. 首席财务官 Youssef Salem 周四在接受采访时表示，该公司正计划收购一家在科威特和阿曼经营石油天然气钻井平台的公司，并计划最早于今年完成交易。【原文：Adnoc Drilling Co. is planning to buy a company operating oil and gas rigs in Kuwait and Oman, and is targeting a deal as early as this year, Chief Financial Officer Youssef Salem said in an interview on Thursday.】

item.title: 沙特经济因强劲的非石油动力而增长 3.9
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯经济连续第五个季度实现增长，这主要得益于非石油部门的稳定增长，以及石油活动恢复扩张，因为沙特在欧佩克+新的供应政策下提高了石油产量。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s economy expanded for a fifth straight quarter, driven by steady growth in the non-oil sector and a return to expansion for oil activities as the kingdom boosts output under new OPEC+ supply policy.】

item.title: 创纪录涨势令需求降温，央行黄金购买放缓
item.description: 各国央行和珠宝商的黄金购买在第二季度有所放缓，因为连续创下历史新高的黄金价格使得推动黄金快速上涨的动力逐渐减弱。【原文：Gold buying by central banks and jewelers eased in the second quarter, as successive all-time-highs in prices led the drivers of a rapid rally to ease their feet off the accelerator.】

item.title: 在特朗普的最后期限到来之前，台湾与美国在贸易问题上接近达成共识
item.description: 台湾表示，其谈判代表正在与美国就双边贸易协议起草一份联合声明，似乎在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税截止日期前一天取得了一些期待已久的进展。【原文：Taiwan said its negotiators are drafting a joint statement with the US on their bilateral trade deal, appearing to make some long-awaited progress just a day ahead of Donald Trump’s tariff deadline.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑下跌，英国股市有望在盈利前保持稳定
截止日期前夕，特朗普释放出一系列贸易惊喜
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在周五的最后期限前夕向盟友和对手提出了一系列关税协议和要求，旨在建立新的全球贸易秩序。【原文：President Donald Trump unleashed a series of tariff deals and demands on allies and adversaries alike on the eve of his Friday deadline aimed at establishing a new global trade order.】

item.title: 不良贷款拨备减少，Mediobanca 利润上升
item.description: Mediobanca SpA 报告称，由于为变质贷款预留的资金减少，利润有所增长，这家意大利贷款机构正努力抵御竞争对手 Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 的意外收购。【原文：Mediobanca SpA reported higher profit after setting aside less money for loans turning sour, as the Italian lender seeks to fend off an unwanted takeover by rival Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA.】

item.title: OpenAI将在挪威建立拥有230兆瓦数据中心的星际之门
item.description: Sam Altman OpenAI 将在挪威建造一个新的数据中心，将其星际之门项目扩展到欧洲。【原文：Sam Altman OpenAI will expand its Stargate project to Europe with the construction of a new data center in Norway.】

item.title: 特朗普关税导致美元暴跌，瑞士央行报告亏损
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策导致美元暴跌，削弱了其庞大的外币投资组合，瑞士央行因此出现亏损。【原文：Switzerland’s central bank swung to a loss as a slump in the dollar caused by Donald Trump’s tariff policies dented its large foreign-currency portfolio.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦与美国签署贸易协议以促进石油储备和市场关系
item.description: 美国与巴基斯坦官员在华盛顿结束会谈时达成了一项贸易协议，双方同意开发石油储备。【原文：The US sealed a trade deal with Pakistan as their officials wrapped up talks in Washington, agreeing to develop oil reserves.】

item.title: 中国传唤英伟达官员，指控人工智能芯片存在安全风险
item.description: 中国当局传唤了 Nvidia 公司的代表，讨论其 H20 人工智能芯片涉嫌存在的安全风险。【原文：Chinese authorities summoned Nvidia Corp. representatives to discuss alleged security risks related to its H20 artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: 中国批准的香港上市申请为八个月来最少
item.description: 中国批准的香港上市申请数量是八个月来最少的，这是继本地公司全年在香港疯狂融资后，此类交易可能放缓的一个潜在迹象。【原文：China has cleared the fewest Hong Kong listing applications in eight months, a potential sign such deals may slow down after local companies went on a fundraising spree in the city all year.】

item.title: 中国顶级鱼子酱生产商卡卢加女王据称酝酿在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，世界最大的鱼子酱生产商卡卢加皇后公司正在考虑在香港进行首次公开募股。【原文：The company behind Kaluga Queen, the world’s biggest caviar producer, is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁经济增长，印度卢比逼近历史最低点
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布计划对印度出口商品征收至少 25% 的关税后，卢比跌幅扩大，跌至历史新低。【原文：The rupee extended its losses, weakening toward a record low after US President Donald Trump announced plans to impose tariffs of at least 25% on Indian exports, higher than previously anticipated.】

item.title: 外汇和债务压力缓解，帝亚吉欧东非业务利润增长
item.description: 由于肯尼亚先令的稳定导致外汇损失减少，以及利率下降降低了融资成本，东非啤酒公司（East African Breweries Plc）的年度利润在连续两年盈利放缓后出现增长。【原文：East African Breweries Plc’s annual profit grew after two years of slowing earnings, as foreign-exchange losses dropped due to a stable Kenyan shilling and lower interest rates cut financing costs.】

item.title: 英国住房开发商缩减项目规模，因为高层住宅项目延期
item.description: 2021 年，Greystar Real Estate Partners 在伦敦巴特西区购买了一块价值 3100 万英镑（4140 万美元）的土地，目的是建造一座可俯瞰泰晤士河、拥有约 300 户的出租公寓楼。这家美国私募股权公司于去年年底向监管机构提交了计划，渴望破土动工。但 40 多周过去了，它仍在等待决定。【原文：In 2021, Greystar Real Estate Partners bought a £31 million ($41.4 million) plot of land in London’s Battersea district with the aim of building a roughly 300-home rental tower overlooking the River Thames. The US private equity firm submitted plans to regulators at the end of last year, keen to break ground. But more than 40 weeks later, it’s still awaiting a decision.】

item.title: 南非将降低利率，关税细节尚待确定
item.description: 在美国征收更严厉的贸易关税前夕，南非储备银行准备延长其自2019年以来最长的宽松周期，这很可能会拖累南非本已疲软的经济增长。【原文：The South African Reserve Bank is poised to extend its longest easing cycle since 2019 on the eve of stiffer US trade tariffs, which are likely to weigh on the country’s already sluggish economic growth.】

item.title: 印尼盾创一个月来最弱，印尼央行出手干预
item.description: 在美联储的鹰派基调使美元汇率一夜之间飙升至两个月高点后，印尼央行对外汇市场进行了干预，以稳定印尼盾。【原文：The Indonesian central bank intervened in foreign-exchange markets to stabilize the rupiah after the Federal Reserve’s hawkish tone sent the dollar surging to a two-month high overnight.】

item.title: 特朗普与安瓦尔通话后，马来西亚将公布美国贸易协议
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统与马来西亚总统安瓦尔-易卜拉欣通电话后，马来西亚将宣布与美国达成一项贸易协议。【原文：Malaysia is set to announce a trade deal with the US after President Donald Trump and his Malaysian counterpart Anwar Ibrahim spoke by telephone.】

item.title: 戴蒙与特朗普复谈经济与美联储利率
item.description: 杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）几个月来一直通过电视热门话题和社交媒体上的帖子互相交流，现在他们终于可以当面交流了。【原文：After months of speaking to each other through TV hits and social media posts, Jamie Dimon and Donald Trump are catching up in person.】

item.title: 美国因伊朗石油贸易制裁又一中国码头
item.description: 美国已经制裁了第四个中国石油码头，这是与伊朗能源贸易有关的新一轮惩罚措施的一部分，华盛顿称伊朗为恐怖活动提供资金。【原文：The US has sanctioned a fourth Chinese oil terminal as part of a new wave of penalties relating to the trade of Iranian energy, which Washington says funds terrorist activities.】
